hero.title: Mr. Miguel Sotelo

about.title: About me
about.p1: I am a second-year <1>Information Systems Engineering</1> student at UTN FRT. Since my school years, computing has been my engine, leading me to specialize early on.
about.p2: I am passionate about <1>web development</1>, immersive applications and video games. In addition to engineering, I am a geography professor, sports enthusiast and geek culture lover.
